column1: https://homestars.com/on/georgina/gutters-eavestroughs,12,https://homestars.com/on/georgina/gutters-eavestroughs?&page=2&,Gutters & Eavestroughs,2794290,http://www.reynoldsbros.ca,/companies/2794290-reynolds-bros-eavestroughs?searched_category_id=347&service_area=1855708,"Reynolds Brothers Exteriors – Gutters like no other! Offering eavestroughs/siding/downpipes, soffit/fascia, leaf gutter guard, and windows/doors.

Reynolds Brothers is a family-run business whose main focus is our commitment to honesty, quality, and customer service. Eavestroughs & Exteriors are often the last thing people think about but are your home's first line of defense against nature's elements.  Our first-class workmanship combined with the most unique and durable options will protect your home for decades to come. Take a look, you’ll be impressed! We offer 4 different styles of eavestrough which really stands out from other companies.

#1 in Customer Service - Our family-run operation is a Homestars Best of 2017 Award Winner and takes pride in our customer service. You can take comfort in knowing that only our professionally trained staff will visit your home to ensure that you get the quality that you deserve. You can be sure that your experience with Reynolds Bros. will be a positive one. From your first contact, through to work completion and inspection, we are very careful to treat both our clients and their beautiful homes with utmost care and respect. We treat you like Family!
Check out our recent Homestars featured article with Ryan from Reynolds Brothers.

https://homestars.com/on/georgina/gutters-eavestroughs,12,https://homestars.com/on/georgina/gutters-eavestroughs?&page=2&,Gutters & Eavestroughs,2785731,http://www.imperialroofs.com,/companies/2785731-imperial-roofs?searched_category_id=347&service_area=2228837,"Imperial Roofs were awarded the Vaughan Citizen Readers Choice Award in 2011

In 1968 my father founded Cel Marchildon Roofing, which has grown into the company we have today.  Through commitment to excellence in our workmanship and materials we have built our reputation of TOTAL CUSTOMER SATISFACTION by providing our customers with the BEST ROOFING SYSTEM that will accommodate their needs and budget.  We will provide you, our valued customer, with a detailed assessment that will outline the specific requirements for your home.

Our expert staff is committed to providing you with the BEST ROOFING EXPERIENCE available in the GTA.  All workers are covered by WORKERS COMPENSATION.  Our company is fully LICENSED AND INSURED to provide you with a WORRY FREE ROOFING EXPERIENCE.  We DO NOT USE ROOFING SUB-CONTRACTORS.  All work is performed by our expert employees.
This may or may not be your first time purchasing a new roof, however we would like to outline some of the key factors in our operating process:

column2: Provide a copy of our Insurance Certificate
Provide a copy of Workplace Insurance Safety Board Certificate upon request
Provide a copy of our Operating License
Protect your home and surrounding area from falling debris
Tear off all old shingles to the roof deck
Inspect the wood deck for rotting and warping areas
Install eave protection to all insulated eaves
Install name brand shingles with your choice 25 years to limited lifetime guarantee
Install proper ventilation to the roof (1sq ft for every 300 sq ft of attic floor area)
Install new metal flashing where needed or refurbish to “new” standards
Install closed valleys with aluminum underneath to ensure maximum protection
Full property clean up using magnetic sweeps and trailers to ensure no driveway damage
All employees are Fall Safety accredited and Crew Chief First Aid and CPR trained

We’re proud to offer one of the most energy efficient windows available on the market today that offers homeowners a significant return on investment all while being backed with the strongest warranty in the business today!

We’re part of the Canadian Standards Association (CSA) and the Better Business Bureau, and in all the years we’ve been in business, we’ve never had an unresolved complaint. We’re members of SAWDAC (Siding and Window Dealers Association of Canada) and make sure that we meet their membership criteria, code of ethics and sign an ironclad five-year workmanship guarantee statement.

We’re also proud to say that our windows are Energy Star certified.  As you probably know, the international Energy Star symbol is a simple way for consumers to identify products that are among the most energy-efficient on the market. We also offer financing through TD Canada Trust, ensuring that our customers have a trustworthy partner too.
Landmark Home Solutions is proud to represent our Canadian heritage in all that we do.  Our windows are made right here, so you know you’re getting the best quality windows in the world.

Trades by Jack is proud to offer this fantastic product to help you. Avoid the messy work involved in dealing with your gutters and eavestroughs.
Say goodbye to the dangerous and unpleasant job of climbing up to your roof to clean out your gutters once and for all, without the expense of paying someone else to do it.

Gutters capture the rainwater from your roof and carry it safely to the ground, away from your foundation, where it can cause serious damage. Ordinary gutters capture leaves, twigs and other organic debris that causes them to clog and overflow during rainstorms.
•LeafGuard’s patented design causes rainwater to flow around its curved hood and into the gutter, keeping leaves and debris out.
•LeafGuard Brand Gutters are guaranteed not to clog for as long as you own your home, or Gutter Depot will clean your gutters for free.
•LeafGuard Gutters are made to fit any home in a variety of colours. Best of all they are made out durable materials, designed to last as long as you have a roof.

Service Areas: Ajax, Aurora, Bolton, Brampton, Burlington, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Maple, Oakville, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, Woodbridge & Beyond!
